QuestData.Title: Great Balls of Fire!
QuestData.Description: Ga'nar led Ligra and the others to the second level of the fortress. Your friend, Thrall, also went to lend his skills.$b$bFollow the ramp on the south end of the ramparts outside to join them.$b$bHelp them bring victory to the Frostwolf Clan!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Thrall in Bladespire Citadel.
QuestData.RewardText: Many were killed or wounded on their way here.
